item.title: 中美贸易战为活跃的二手芯片齿轮市场蒙上阴影
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Mayumi Negishi 从东京发回的报道涉及二手芯片制造设备的世界，贸易限制在这里投下了巨大的阴影。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Mayumi Negishi writes from Tokyo about the world of used chipmaking equipment, where trade restrictions cast a big shadow.】

item.title: 特朗普领导的政府专家组削减联邦开支的举措引发混乱
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注的是特朗普政府削减联邦开支的努力。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at the Trump administration’s effort to reduce federal spending. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 欧盟展现 "实力 "对抗特朗普的金属关税
item.description: 欧盟威胁要对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对所有进口钢铁和铝征收的关税进行报复，这有可能重新引发一场跨大西洋贸易战，除非世界上贸易和投资关系最密切的伙伴们能在下个月达成一项协议。【原文：The European Union threatened retaliation against US President Donald Trump’s planned tariffs on all steel and aluminum imports, potentially reviving a transatlantic trade war unless partners in the world’s deepest trading and investment relationship can broker a deal over the next month.】

item.title: 杜邦公司盈利飙升，得益于分拆前电子产品的强劲表现
item.description: 杜邦公司（DuPont de Nemours Inc.【原文：DuPont de Nemours Inc.’s earnings jumped on growth in the electronics market, suggesting the conglomerate’s push to cut costs and break up into smaller, more focused businesses is paying off.】

item.title: 印度央行干预抑制投机性卢比押注
item.description: 据一位熟悉印度储备银行想法的人士透露，印度储备银行本周对外汇市场进行了干预，以抑制卢比的投机行为。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India intervened in the foreign exchange market this week to curb speculation in the rupee, according to a person familiar with the central bank’s thinking, surprising traders who expected a more hands-off approach on the currency from the new governor.】

item.title: Meta 16 天连胜是扎克伯格人工智能愿景的胜利
item.description: 即使在人工智能获胜者获得丰厚回报的市场中，Meta Platforms 公司也能脱颖而出。该公司股价已连续 16 个交易日上涨，是自 1990 年以来纳斯达克 100 指数公司中连续上涨时间最长的。尽管人们对微软和 Alphabet 的人工智能支出何时能得到回报还存在疑问，但 Meta 的投资改变了它瞄准和衡量广告的方式，这意味着它将更快地获得回报。【原文：Even in a market where AI winners are richly rewarded, Meta Platforms stands out.The shares are coming off a rally of 16 straight sessions, the longest streak of any current Nasdaq 100 Index company going back to 1990. The stock added more than 17% over the surge, bringing its market capitalization above $1.8 trillion.While there are questions about when Microsoft and Alphabet will see a return on their AI spending, Meta’s investment has changed how it targets and measures ads, meaning faster gr】

item.title: 红海船舶流量尚未回升，停火风险仍在蔓延
item.description: 最近几周，尽管也门胡塞武装长期没有发动袭击，但红海的船舶运输仍然缓慢。【原文：Ship traffic through the Red Sea has remained slow in recent weeks despite a prolonged period without attacks from Yemen’s Houthis.】

item.title: 天然气储量水平下降，德国就天然气储量支持问题展开激烈谈判
item.description: 德国天然气市场管理公司表示，在欧洲濒临又一次供应紧张的边缘之际，该公司正在与有关部门 "深入讨论 "为储气库再充气提供补贴的可能性。【原文：Germany’s gas market manager said it’s in “intensive discussions” with authorities about potential subsidies to refill storage sites as Europe teeters on the edge of another supply crunch.】

item.title: 英国将出售创纪录的 130 亿英镑债券，出价超过历史最高水平
item.description: 英国将出售创纪录的 130 亿英镑（160 亿美元）10 年期债券，因为投资者热衷于锁定接近数十年高点的收益率，对此类证券的需求达到历史最高水平。【原文：The UK is set to sell a record £13 billion ($16 billion) of 10-year bonds after attracting the highest-ever demand for such securities from investors keen to lock-in yields near multi-decade highs.】

item.title: 特姆公司在关税之后全面整顿供应链，面临涨价风险
item.description: 面对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的新关税政策，在线购物巨头特姆普（Temu）将放弃对其中国供应链的实质性控制，此举有可能推高这款经济型购物应用的价格。【原文：Online shopping giant Temu is giving up substantial control of its Chinese supply chain in the face of President Donald Trump’s new tariffs, a move that threatens to drive up prices on the budget shopping app.】

item.title: 大量美国工人未披露慢性病状况
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，慢性病正在给美国劳动力造成巨大损失，而造成这种损失的部分原因是许多员工不愿将自己的情况告诉雇主。【原文：Chronic health conditions are taking a toll on the US workforce, one that’s partly hidden because many employees are reluctant to tell employers about their situation, according to a new study.】

item.title: Meta Rally 利用人工智能发起进攻，创造历史
item.description: 即使在人工智能优胜者获得奖励的市场中，Meta Platforms 公司的股票也能脱颖而出。【原文：Even in a market where artificial intelligence winners are rewarded, Meta Platforms Inc. shares stand out.】

item.title: 奥特曼抨击马斯克的收购要约，称其试图放慢 OpenAI 的发展速度
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）表示，该公司 "非卖品"，而埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）很可能是想通过主动出价收购这家人工智能先驱来拖延公司的进展。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman said the company is “not for sale” and Elon Musk is probably trying to delay its progress with an unsolicited bid for the artificial intelligence pioneer.】

item.title: 加拿大小盘股巍然屹立，交易商摒弃关税风险
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战几乎没有放缓的迹象，加拿大小型股票的表现好于大型股票。【原文：Canada’s smaller stocks are holding up better than their larger peers as US President Donald Trump’s trade war shows few signs of slowing.】

item.title: 天然气储量下降，欧洲将遭遇北极寒流袭击
item.description: 随着天然气价格达到两年多来的最高点，低温和低风力发电量将给欧洲紧张的能源市场带来更大压力。【原文：Freezing temperatures and low wind power production will put further pressure on Europe’s strained energy market, as natural gas prices trade at the highest in more than two years.】

item.title: 瑞士指控男子利用银行家朋友的 M&A 提示进行内幕交易
item.description: 一名瑞士男子因涉嫌从投资银行家朋友分享的并购提示中获利 1060 万瑞士法郎（约合 1160 万美元）而被指控犯有内幕交易罪。【原文：A Swiss man was charged with insider trading after allegedly making 10.6 million francs ($11.6 million) from merger tips shared by an investment banker friend.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行的 Orcel 称德国商业银行的决定还需一年时间
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 表示，预计将在今年年底或明年年初决定是否收购德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）。【原文：UniCredit SpA expects to decide on a potential takeover of Commerzbank AG at the end of this year or early next year, Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯国家支出激增，月度赤字超过 2025 年目标
item.description: 俄罗斯 1 月份的国家支出激增，使当月的预算赤字超过了政府的全年目标。【原文：Russia’s state expenditures surged in January, pushing the month’s budget deficit to exceed the government’s target for the full year.】

item.title: 孟加拉国寻求阿达尼电力公司全面供电
item.description: 孟加拉国要求印度阿达尼电力有限公司（Adani Power Ltd. ）按照原始协议的约定恢复全部电力供应。【原文：Bangladesh has asked India’s Adani Power Ltd. to restore full electricity supply as agreed in the original pact, three months after a faceoff with the Indian firm over unpaid dues.】

item.title: 鲍威尔作证前，关税问题占据主导地位，国债下跌
item.description: 由于交易员预计美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔将在周二晚些时候的讲话中重申货币政策按兵不动，国债下跌。【原文：Treasuries dipped as traders anticipate Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell will reiterate monetary policy is on hold in remarks due later on Tuesday.】

item.title: 腾讯 Supercell 移动游戏部门销售额增长 77
item.description: 尽管移动游戏市场困难重重，但《乱斗星际》（Brawl Stars）和《部落冲突》（Clash of Clans）等热门游戏背后的芬兰视频游戏公司 Supercell Oy 仍为母公司腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd. ）带来了巨大收益、【原文：Supercell Oy, the Finnish video-game company behind such hits as Brawl Stars and Clash of Clans, is delivering big gains for parent Tencent Holdings Ltd. despite a difficult market for mobile play,】

item.title: 停火缓解经济压力，以色列重回债券市场
item.description: 周二，以色列重新进入全球债券市场，开始了一笔美元交易，因为它希望在经历了 16 个多月的战争后增强其资产负债表。【原文：Israel re-entered the global bond market on Tuesday, starting a dollar deal as it looks to bolster its balance sheet after more than 16 months of war.】

item.title: 据说 KKR 将长期持有 Flora 业务以解决债务问题
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.公司现在很可能至少在 2026 年之前一直持有这家 Flora 和 Country Crock 系列产品的生产商，因为它希望在上市或出售之前减少债务。【原文：KKR & Co. is now likely to hold onto the maker of Flora and Country Crock spreads until at least 2026, as it seeks to reduce its debt before any listing or sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元前景黯淡，东南亚股市暴跌
item.description: 美元长达数月的飙升给东南亚股市再添一击，该地区的投资者已经开始回避该地区放缓的经济增长前景。【原文：The dollar’s monthslong surge is adding another blow to Southeast Asian stock markets, where investors are already retreating to sidestep slowing economic growth prospects in the region.】

item.title: Spotify 创始人卖出蓬勃发展的科技股获利 10 亿美元
item.description: Spotify Technology SA 的创始人最近通过出售这家音频流媒体巨头的股票赚取了约 10 亿美元，他们在公司之外的投资也在不断增加。【原文：Spotify Technology SA’s founders recently pocketed about $1 billion from selling the audio-streaming giant’s stock as they increasingly build up investments outside the company.】

item.title: 华利安聘用前巴克莱银行行员担任亚洲区高级职务
item.description: 全球金融顾问公司华利安公司（Houlihan Lokey Inc.【原文：Global financial adviser Houlihan Lokey Inc. has hired Angela Hu as managing director in the firm’s financial sponsors team, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 前红杉印度公司削减基金费用后失去两名合伙人
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在红杉资本削减其最新的增长基金并削减其他基金的费用数月后，红杉资本的前隶属公司 Peak XV Partners 将失去两名合伙人。【原文：Peak XV Partners, formerly part of Sequoia Capital, is losing two of its partners, according to people familiar with the matter, months after the firm reduced its latest growth fund and cut fees on others.】

item.title: 制裁余波未平，中国将获得更便宜的俄罗斯石油
item.description: 由于对美国制裁的担忧与日俱增，增加了物流和行政方面的障碍，使买家望而却步，中国炼油厂正以较低的价格获得俄罗斯ESPO原油货物。【原文：Chinese refiners are being offered Russian ESPO crude cargoes at lower prices as growing concern around US sanctions increase logistical and administrative hurdles, putting off buyers.】

item.title: 汇丰聘请前法国巴黎银行家孙为亚洲债务市场主管
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）聘请前法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）银行家孙治勋（George Sun）担任亚洲区全球债务市场主管，在该行进行重组之际吸引了一位外部人士。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc hired former BNP Paribas SA banker George Sun as head of global debt markets for Asia, attracting an outsider even as the bank undergoes a restructuring.】

item.title: 欧盟表示将对美国关税采取反制措施
item.description: 欧盟表示，它将对美国可能对其征收的任何关税做出回应，从而使潜在的跨大西洋贸易争端升级。【原文：The European Union said it will respond to any tariffs the US might impose on it, escalating a potential transatlantic trade dispute.】
